associations.evidence: Wide receiver Pat Bryant and tight end Nate Adkins improved to full participants Thursday ahead of Denver's Week 18 game against the Chargers.
Wide receiver Pat Bryant and tight end Nate Adkins improved to full participants Thursday ahead of Denver's Week 18 game against the Chargers.
Guard Ben Powers (biceps) and inside linebacker Karene Reid (hamstring) remained full participants in practice.
Guard Ben Powers (biceps) and inside linebacker Karene Reid (hamstring) remained full participants in practice.
Defensive lineman John Franklin-Myers (hip) remained a limited participant.
Linebacker Dre Greenlaw (hamstring) did not practice on Thursday.
